appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Manage your DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge and SecureClick
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

htmlTitle.description: The title of the application in html format.

BRIDGE_Update_Feedback.message:
DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge firmware was successfully updated!
New version is:

BRIDGE_Version_Progress.message: Requesting DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge firmware version...

BRIDGE_bond_remove_Feedback.message: All DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge connections are removed!

BLE_bond_remove_Feedback.message: All DIGIPASS SecureClick connections are removed!

BRIDGE_Error_Pairing.message: There is no Bluetooth Bridge connected or the DIGIPASS SecureClick is not in pairing mode.

BRIDGE_Error_Request.message: There is no DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge connected or the DIGIPASS SecureClick is not in range of the DIGIPASS  Bluetooth Bridge. Be sure the DIGIPASS SecureClick is paired with the DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge.

BRIDGE_Error_Connection.message: There is no DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge connected or the DIGIPASS SecureClick is not turned on or in range of the DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge.

BLE_Remove_pairings_cmd.message:
Remove DIGIPASS SecureClick connection.
Short press on DIGIPASS SecureClick

BLE_info_request.message:
Requesting DIGIPASS SecureClick info.
Short press on SecureClick

BLE_pairing_request.message:
Pair with DIGIPASS SecureClick.
Long press on SecureClick

BLE_connection_progress.message: Trying to connect to the DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge.

BRIDGE_waiting.message: Waiting for DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge to respond.

BLE_Already_Paired.message: FIDO authenticator you wanted to pair is already paired with the DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge

DONGLE_to_much_bonds.message: All Bluetooth Bridge bonds are taken.

BLE_Adding_bond_Progress.message: The DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge has found a new FIDO authenticator and is currently adding it to its pairing list

BRIDGE_Start_Update.message: Starting DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge firmware update...

BLE_Update_Success.message:
Activate image and reset.
Update succeeded.

BLE_Update_Request.message:
Update the DIGIPASS SecureClick firmware.
Short press on DIGIPASS SecureClick

BLE_Connection_Progress.message: Found a DIGIPASS SecureClick, trying to connect...

BLE_Firmware_Start_Progress.message: Initializing the DIGIPASS SecureClick to transfer the data (about 30 sec)

BRIDGE_To_Many_Feedback.message: Please just insert one DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge.

BRIDGE_Insert_Request.message: Please insert a DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge

BRIDGE_Remove_Pairing_Request.message: Are you sure you want to remove the DIGIPASS Bluetooth Bridge pairings?

BLE_Remove_Pairing_Request.message: Are you sure you want to remove the DIGIPASS SecureClick connections?

BLE_RSSI_Request.message:
Requesting RSSI from DIGIPASS SecureClick.
Short press on SecureClick

BRIDGE_RSSI_REQUEST.message:
Testing Bluetooth link.
Short press on SecureClick
